languages.text: Во многих каютах все еще покоятся тела членов экипажа. Их убили нехватка воздуха и холод, когда системы жизнеобеспечения отказали. Один из блюстителей замечает тайник, помеченный символом зубастого змея с острым хвостом и тремя когтистыми лапами. В нем лежат амулет и чудом сохранившийся дневник.

Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.
languages.original_text: Во многих каютах все еще покоятся тела членов экипажа. Их убили нехватка воздуха и холод, когда системы жизнеобеспечения отказали. Один из блюстителей замечает тайник, помеченный символом зубастого змея с острым хвостом и тремя когтистыми лапами. В нем лежат амулет и чудом сохранившийся дневник.

traits.locale_text: In many of the cabins, the bodies of crew members are still residing. They were killed by lack of air and the cold when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a toothy serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed paws. It contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

In many of the cabins, the bodies of crew members are still residing. They were killed by lack of air and the cold when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a toothy serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed paws. It contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

In many of the cabins, the bodies of the crew are still entombed. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three-toed claws. It contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

In many of the cabins, the bodies of the crew are still entombed. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three-toed claws. It contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

languages.text: Muchos de los camarotes se han convertido en tumbas para los cuerpos de la tripulación. Se asfixiaron cuando los sistemas de soporte vital de la nave fallaron. Uno de los guardias repara en un contenedor marcado con el símbolo de una serpiente de boca abierta, cola afilada y tres extremidades con garras. Contiene un amuleto del mismo diseño y un diario preservado por puro milagro.
languages.original_text: Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

traits.locale_text: Muchos de los camarotes se han convertido en tumbas para los cuerpos de la tripulación. Se asfixiaron cuando los sistemas de soporte vital de la nave fallaron. Uno de los guardias repara en un contenedor marcado con el símbolo de una serpiente de boca abierta, cola afilada y tres extremidades con garras. Contiene un amuleto del mismo diseño y un diario preservado por puro milagro.

languages.text: 船室の多くは乗組員の墓場となっている。船の生命維持装置が故障し、窒息死したのだ。エンフォーサーの一人が、鋭い尾と3本の爪のある牙を生やした蛇のシンボルが記されたキャッシュに気が付いた。その中にはお守りと一緒に、奇跡的に保管されていた日記が入っていた。
languages.original_text: Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

traits.locale_text: 船室の多くは乗組員の墓場となっている。船の生命維持装置が故障し、窒息死したのだ。エンフォーサーの一人が、鋭い尾と3本の爪のある牙を生やした蛇のシンボルが記されたキャッシュに気が付いた。その中にはお守りと一緒に、奇跡的に保管されていた日記が入っていた。

languages.text: 许多船舱已经成为船员尸体的坟墓。当时，飞船的生命维持系统失灵，所有船员都窒息而死。其中一名执法者注意到一个藏匿处，上面画着一条长着尖牙的蛇，这条蛇有一条锋利的尾巴和三条爪肢。藏匿处里有一枚护身符，以及一本保存完好的日记。
languages.original_text: Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

traits.locale_text: 许多船舱已经成为船员尸体的坟墓。当时，飞船的生命维持系统失灵，所有船员都窒息而死。其中一名执法者注意到一个藏匿处，上面画着一条长着尖牙的蛇，这条蛇有一条锋利的尾巴和三条爪肢。藏匿处里有一枚护身符，以及一本保存完好的日记。

languages.text: Viele Kabinen sind zu Gräbern für die Leichen der Crew geworden. Sie sind erstickt, als die Lebenserhaltungssysteme des Schiffs ausfielen. Einer der Enforcers bemerkt ein Lager mit dem Symbol einer Schlange mit Zähnen, einem spitzen Schwanz und drei klauenbewehrten Gliedern. Das Lager enthält ein Amulett und ein wundersamerweise erhaltenes Tagebuch.
languages.original_text: Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

traits.locale_text: Viele Kabinen sind zu Gräbern für die Leichen der Crew geworden. Sie sind erstickt, als die Lebenserhaltungssysteme des Schiffs ausfielen. Einer der Enforcers bemerkt ein Lager mit dem Symbol einer Schlange mit Zähnen, einem spitzen Schwanz und drei klauenbewehrten Gliedern. Das Lager enthält ein Amulett und ein wundersamerweise erhaltenes Tagebuch.

languages.text: Bon nombre de cabines sont devenues des tombeaux pour les défunts membres de l'équipage. Ils sont morts asphyxiés lorsque les systèmes de survie du vaisseau ont flanché. L'un des prévôts repère une cache marquée d'un symbole à l'effigie d'un serpent aux crochets apparents, muni d'une queue acérée et de trois appendices griffus. À l'intérieur, une amulette et un journal miraculeusement préservé.
languages.original_text: Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.

traits.locale_text: Bon nombre de cabines sont devenues des tombeaux pour les défunts membres de l'équipage. Ils sont morts asphyxiés lorsque les systèmes de survie du vaisseau ont flanché. L'un des prévôts repère une cache marquée d'un symbole à l'effigie d'un serpent aux crochets apparents, muni d'une queue acérée et de trois appendices griffus. À l'intérieur, une amulette et un journal miraculeusement préservé.

languages.text: Kabinlerden pek çoğu, mürettebatın cesetleri için âdeta birer kabre dönmüş. Geminin yaşam destek sistemi kesildiğinde havasızlıktan ölmüşler. İnfazcılardan biri, keskin bir kuyruğa ve pençeli üç bacağa sahip sivri dişli bir engerek sembolüyle işaretlenmiş bir zulayı fark ediyor. Zulanın içinde bir uğurluk ve mucizevi şekilde korunmuş bir günlük bulunuyor.
languages.original_text: Many of the cabins have become tombs for the bodies of the crew. They asphyxiated when the ship's life support systems failed. One of the enforcers notices a cache marked with the symbol of a fanged serpent with a sharp tail and three clawed limbs. The cache contains an amulet and a miraculously preserved diary.
